definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: A handy cam icon is displayed on slides generated using FMR.
sentences.chinese: 使用FMR產生的幻燈片，會顯示手持攝像機圖標。

sentences.english: The slides show taxes paying form of tax system of Republic of Uzbekistan.
sentences.chinese: 幻燈片提供的是烏茲別克斯坦共和國稅務系統納稅表。

sentences.english: Here you should slide the screen area bar to the left.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，您應該幻燈片屏幕面積大律師公會到左邊。

sentences.english: Music video by Tiziano Ferro performing Scivoli Di Nuovo.
sentences.chinese: 音樂由提香鐵表演視頻幻燈片回來。

sentences.english: Whether it is a prototype, slide, insert or unscrewing, we have the experience to produce it.
sentences.chinese: 無論是樣機，幻燈片，插入或掛畫，我們有經驗產生。

sentences.english: The slideshows listed below are for your viewing pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 下面展出的幻燈片或視頻是讓您看着高興的。

sentences.english: So, next we'll create functionality for adding and deleting slides.
sentences.chinese: 所以，接下來我們將創建添加和刪除幻燈片的功能。

sentences.english: I am a MAC user. How do I view Powerpoint files?
sentences.chinese: 如果是蘋果電腦裝配的用戶，怎樣看幻燈片文件？

sentences.english: I took some transparencies of the cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 我拍了一些大教堂的幻燈片。

sentences.english: So I'll now put these slides online, certainly if you are scribbling things down.
sentences.chinese: 當然如果你們需要，我會將這些幻燈片共享。

sentences.english: There were bullet points galore. Complete with photos of fluffy white rabbits and rainbows.
sentences.chinese: 幻燈片條理清晰，並配以大白兔以及彩虹的圖片。

sentences.english: Slide access notebook compartment is lined in faux fur for optimum protection.
sentences.chinese: 幻燈片訪問筆記本車廂兩旁是人造毛皮最佳的保護。

sentences.english: Make a slideshow of your favorite digital photographs.
sentences.chinese: 把你們最喜歡的數碼相片用幻燈片形式播放。

sentences.english: And I shouldn't have played with my slides this morning.
sentences.chinese: 我早上不應該亂動我的幻燈片。

sentences.english: As mentioned earlier this is a very basic filmstrip control.
sentences.chinese: 如前所述，這是一個很基本的幻燈片的控制。

sentences.english: It will also be faster than this filmstrip control.
sentences.chinese: 它還將高於這個幻燈片的控制。

definition: courseware (abbr. for 課程軟件|课程软件[ke4 cheng2 ruan3 jian4])
